StringGet = {}

function StringGet:get(str)
   local tid = TranslateDic[str] or str
    return tid
    -- todo
   --local txt = ConfigReader:getDataByNameIdAndKey("Translate",tid,"context")
   --txt = txt or str
   --return txt
end
--- 临时文本配置 所有文本需要配置到 多语言表中
TranslateDic = {
  UI_BattleMain_autoBattle = "自动",
  UI_BattleMain_manualOperationBattle = "手动",
  UI_BattleMain_battleSpeed1 = "x1",
  UI_BattleMain_battleSpeed2 = "x2",
  UI_BattleMain_battleSpeed3 = "x3",
}
